label.phrase: i am of the opinion that they should put a patch like that at all the tracks go somewhere and find a groove that you never run and pave it brand new it will mix things up that patch at pocono in turn 3 made it so fun that's because you had the opportunity to dive to the bottom and take the shortest way around and try to beat a guy around a corner who is taking the long way on some fresh asphalt that fresh asphalt had a lot of grip i thought it was fun to be honest with you pocono has always been one of my favorite tracks but this new patch of pavement has made it even more fun because it gives us another groove to race it's another option and that's always a good thing to have
